data.description:
VR Offices! FREE app for *multiple* Virtual Screens in VR for Mac/PC/Linux (with no extra hardware) in stunning virtual worlds!
Immersed is great for solo work with multiple screens in a virtual cafe, or for collaborating with your team around even more screens and whiteboards!

immersed.com

• FOCUS on your work with MASSIVE virtual screens in stunning virtual worlds!
• COWORK with remote users in a virtual cafe!
• COLLABORATE with your team by multi-screen sharing or whiteboarding like in person!

NOTE: For best quality/latency, use WiFi Direct: immersed.com/wifi-direct

changelog.change_log:
Replace keyboard portal with easier to manipulate version.
Introduce follow mode when in full passthrough and enabled via the screen UI.

Minor bug fixes.
Update links.

Reduce quick menu misfires when hands folded.
Improve environment loading.
UI fixes on screen.
Add confirmations for adding and removing virtual displays.

Room joining bug fixes.
Fix dim screen if enabled on Agent.
Fix visibility of VR cursor when hiding screens or changing seats.
Miscellaneous fixes and improvements.
Update room joining and room updates.

Fix VR cursor when changing seats.
Fix agent opening incorrect link.

Do Not Disturb now respects mobile call-in users.
Screens now hide when keyboard passthrough is enabled and you try to change seats.
Properly cache offline data to prevent issues entering Immersed when offline.
Fix issue that prevented wired connection when offline.
Minor updates to screen rendering libraries.

Remove line from hands and controllers and update cursor.
Add new home office environment for Pro users.
Update rendering libraries.
Fix calendar urls.

Implement real time updates of user account data, features and streaks.
Improve memory management during screen connection.
Fix freeze on launch caused by disabled microphone permissions.
Update server for coworking and public rooms.
Revert screen visual updates.
Fix wired connection.

Update end to end encryption for local and shared connections.
Screen connection improvements and retry logic added if failing to load.
Allow connection to mobile agent before computer connection.
Add speaking indicator in participants list.
Mic will turn red if there is a connection issue.
Add Enable hands tip for new users.
Loading screen UI now have slight opacity. Add fade for main menu.
Fixes and improvements to voice connection
Fix spatial audio resetting when switching rooms.
Fix sorting of discovered agents in UI.
Fix saving layouts when data is corrupt.
Fix screens from showing during timeout of keyboard passthrough tutorial.

Update voice architecture in Collaboration and Public rooms.
Fix ReadyPlayerMe avatars not instantiating.
Adjustments to spatial audio.

Fix issue where screen sharing would fail.
Correct issue for saving layouts when wired connection disconnects.

Improve saving and loading of screen layouts between sessions and installs.
Fix UI refreshing in profile menu.
Fix issue with bluetooth mouse incorrectly being detected.

Fixes to backend calls to Immersed's api.
Fix log file size getting too large.
Minor UI fixes.
Update credits reward system.

Add support for Freezing streaks and using power ups from Profile Menu.
Backend change for handling public rooms.

Slightly increase default menu size.
Handle issues when snapgrid and VR cursor wouldn't initialize correctly.
Minor performance improvements.
Menu copy updates.

* Bug fixes around screens and snap grid.
* Add Quest3 controller models
* Handle case when Full Body ReadyPlayerMe avatars are used, default to Immersed coin.
* Localization fixes in friend menu
* Log upload is now a manual process in Help menu
